CustomField.description: If set, it overrides the Practice to which the TC Split 's Revenue Transactions will roll up for Practice Actuals, even if its Project or Resource are in a different Practice. Note that either way, the Revenue Transactions will continue to roll up to the same Project's Project Actuals and same Resource's Resource Actuals.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If set, it overrides the Practice to which the TC Split 's Revenue Transactions will roll up for Practice Actuals, even if its Project or Resource are in a different Practice.
CustomField.label: Override Revenue Practice
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Override Revenue Practice For Timecard Splits
